## Table of Contents

* [`windows_defender`](#windows_defender): Manage Windows Defender antivirus

## Classes

### <a name="windows_defender"></a>`windows_defender`

Simple module to manage Widows Defender

#### Examples

##### Basic example

```puppet
include windows_defender
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `windows_defender` class:

* [`allow_disabling`](#-windows_defender--allow_disabling)
* [`update_before_scan`](#-windows_defender--update_before_scan)
* [`ui_lockdown`](#-windows_defender--ui_lockdown)
* [`purge_exclusions`](#-windows_defender--purge_exclusions)

##### <a name="-windows_defender--allow_disabling"></a>`allow_disabling`

Data type: `Boolean`

Allow disabling Windows Defender

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-windows_defender--update_before_scan"></a>`update_before_scan`

Data type: `Boolean`

Update virus definitions before a scan

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-windows_defender--ui_lockdown"></a>`ui_lockdown`

Data type: `Boolean`

Headless UI mode.  Makes it impossible for users to interact with the interface

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-windows_defender--purge_exclusions"></a>`purge_exclusions`

Data type: `Boolean`

Remove all exclusions form Windows Defender

Default value: `false`

## Tasks

### <a name="status"></a>`status`

Check status of Windows Defender

**Supports noop?** false
